DEFAULT_ERRORS.SERVER_ERROR: Request could not be completed due to server encountered error. Please try again later.
DEFAULT_ERRORS.INVALID_AUTH: Request could not be completed due to invalid authorization
DEFAULT_ERRORS.MISSING_AUTH: Please specify authorization header to access the resource
DEFAULT_ERRORS.VALIDATION_ERROR: Please specify valid request parameters to continue

VAL_ERRORS.USR_ACC_MISSING_EMAIL: Please specify an email address to continue
VAL_ERRORS.USR_ACC_MISSING_PWD: Please specify a password to continue
VAL_ERRORS.USR_ACC_NEW_EMAIL_EXISTS: An account is already registered with this email address. Please use a different email address to complete the registration
VAL_ERRORS.USR_ACC_LOGIN_MISSING_EMAIL: Please specify an email address to login
VAL_ERRORS.USR_ACC_LOGIN_INVALID_EMAIL: Please specify a valid email address to login
VAL_ERRORS.USR_ACC_LOGIN_MISSING_PWD: Please specify a password to login
VAL_ERRORS.USR_ACC_LOGIN_INVALID_CRE: Please specify a valid username and password to login
VAL_ERRORS.STORE_MISSING_NAME: Please specify a valid name to continue
VAL_ERRORS.INVALID_AMOUNT: Please specify a valid amount greater than 0 to continue

PAYMENT.TRANSACTION_PAID: The transaction has been paid. Please make sure you are paying for the correct transaction
PAYMENT.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE: You have insufficient balance to pay the transaction. Please make sure you have enough balance in your wallet to continue
PAYMENT.INSUFFICIENT_BALANCE_TO_EXECUTE_TRANSACT: You have insufficient balance to execute the transaction. Please transfer at least %s ETH to your wallet %s to continue.
